title: James Stavridis: "To Risk It All"
description: Michael's conversation with Retired Navy Admiral James Stavridis, on "To Risk It All: Nine Conflicts and the Crucible of Decision." Original air date 2 June 2022. The book was published on 24 May 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (James Stavridis, TC Scornavacchi, Michael Smerconish)
